org.sakaiproject.shortenedurl.impl

Class BaseShortenedUrlService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.shortenedurl.impl.BaseShortenedUrlService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ShortenedUrlService

    public class BaseShortenedUrlService
extends Object
implements ShortenedUrlService
    This is the base implementing class which delegates all methods to the configured implementation.
    Author:
    Steve Swinsburg (steve.swinsburg@gmail.com)

      • shorten

        public String shorten(String url,
             boolean secure)
        Description copied from interface: ShortenedUrlService
        Provide an implementation of this which generates a shortened URL given some other URL.

        This method also provides an optional flag which you can use to make your URL more secure.

        Specified by:
        shorten in interface ShortenedUrlService
        Returns:
        the full shortened URL
